name: MetaPhlAn 3.0
description: Taxonomic classification of paired-end WGS data

input_folder.help: Folder containing all input files (FASTQ pairs)

file_suffix.help: File ending for all input FASTQ files

cpus.help: Number of CPUs to allocate for each process

memory_gb.help: Amount of memory (GBs) to allocate for each process
